title: 'Enjoy the third-place play-off': Eddie Jones makes dig at Wales' Gatland – video
text: Eddie Jones has hit back at Warren Gatland after his comments about England ahead of Saturday’s Rugby World Cup final. The Wales head coach had said: “We have seen in previous World Cups that teams sometimes play their final in semi-finals and don’t always turn up for a final. So it will be interesting to see how England are next week and it could be a good game.” When asked about this during a press conference Jones told his old sparring partner to “enjoy the third-fourth place play-off”, before warning of South Africa’s physical threat.
description: The England coach hit back at Warren Gatland’s comments about England ahead of the Rugby World Cup final this weekend
